name: Satori Apartment
address: 39D Hang Hanh, Hoan Kiem, Hoan Kiem District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Satori Apartment offers accommodation in Hanoi, 300 metres from Ngoc Son Temple. The property features views of the city and is 300 metres from St. Joseph Cathedral. Free WiFi is featured .

The kitchen is fitted with an oven, a microwave and a fridge, as well as a kettle. Towels and bed linen are available in this self-catering accommodation. Other facilities at Satori Apartment include a terrace.

Hoan Kiem Lake is 400 metres from Satori Apartment, while Thang Long Water Puppet Theater is 400 metres away. Noi Bai International Airport is 21 km from the property.
